categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: OS-72-10 was a TIE pilot in the Imperial Navy who had at certain points served aboard the Imperial-class Star Destroyers Conquest and Thunderflare, as well as the Super Star Destroyer Executor. By 4 ABY, OS-72-10 had joined the Imperial Obsidian Squadron, flying under the call sign of Obsidian 10.

By 4 ABY, Obsidian 10, stationed aboard the Thunderflare, was recalled to defend the Empire's Death Star II during its construction in the Endor system. OS-72-10 wore the standard uniform for TIE pilots. He also had no interest in advancing in rank, as it would remove him from the pilot's seat.

OS-72-10 was first pictured in 1997's Star Wars Trilogy Sourcebook, Special Edition, before being named in the Special Edition Limited expansion set of the Decipher, Inc. Star Wars Customizable Card Game, released one year later.
